code: import{RECEIVE_VOLUME}from'../actions/player_actions';var playerReducer=function playerReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{volume:0.5};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;Object.freeze(state);switch(action.type){case RECEIVE_VOLUME:return Object.assign({},state,{volume:action.volume});default:return state;}};export default playerReducer;
